text: Ranger Rick (then Ranger Rick's Nature Magazine) is an American children's nature magazine. It is published by the National Wildlife Federation. The magazine features stories, comics, games, jokes, and articles for kids to know and learn about nature, and how to protect it. The mascot of the magazine is a raccoon called Ranger Rick, who appears in every issue with his friends. The first issue of the magazine was made in 1967 by J.A. Brownridge. The magazine is still printed today, along with the magazines Ranger Rick Jr. (for preschoolers), and Ranger Rick Cub (for toddlers). Category:American children's magazines
title: Ranger Rick
